@description.name: @description
@description.body:
This class contains the translation of a message and all information
to translate it again into a different language.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: args {Array} list of arguments passed used as values for format strings
@param.description: list of arguments passed used as values for format strings

@param.name: @param
@param.body: localized {Boolean} True if the string uses localize instead of translate
@param.description: True if the string uses localize instead of translate

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Get a translation of the string using the current locale.

@return.name: @return
@return.body:
{qx.locale.LocalizedString|String} This string translated using the current
locale.
@return.description:
This string translated using the current
locale.

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {String} The messageId of this localized String
@return.description: The messageId of this localized String
